value.title: DAX Fridays! #9: RANKX DAX Function
value.excerpt: Learn how to use the DAX RANKX() function to arrange your data based on criteria that you specify.  Keynotes: 00:00 Intro 03:00 Rankx on categories 03:17 Rankx ascending or descending 03:35 Rankx with allselected  05:28 Rank with blanks 05:28 07:26 Rank on products 07:26 10:50  Rank with column 10:50

value.title: Forecasting in Power BI
value.excerpt: In this video, we will learn how we can forecast our data in Power BI. We will be discussing which visualization supports forecasting in Power BI. We can perform forecasting with a Line chart in Power BI.  In this video, we have taken an example of a real-life scenario to forecast our data.  Stay Connected

value.title: Power BI Shows Incorrect Measure Total? How to fix it?
value.excerpt: During this session, we will try to resolve one of the most common issues that occur in Power BI Desktop which is Incorrect Measure Total issue for table or matrix visual. value.title: A quick look at the new Power BI Report Builder
